body:
Should the current behavior be preserved for non-stdlib packages in `go env GOPATH`? E.g. _"If there are multiple candidate packages, the shortest one wins."_: [golang.org/x/tools/imports/fix.go:356]

[golang.org/x/tools/imports/fix.go:356]: https://github.com/golang/tools/blob/4f8578d2c095328e9192e9d0b0ea335c6ea3e9a5/imports/fix.go#L356-358
